name: I met a great counsellor
message: My counsellor was a lady by the name Tintswalo. She was excellent, she helped me make an appointment with a GP and then I was referred to a specialized Dr at a nearby hospital.

name: Grateful for the service
message: The telemedicine service was outstanding. It saved me a lot of travel time and expenses.

name: Quick and easy consultation
message: The virtual consultation was quick and easy. I received the necessary prescription within minutes.
